title: WooCommerce: Activación automática (3 pasos)
description: Automatización que se activa cuando ocurren eventos en WooCommerce y integra 3 servicios.

title: Receive updates when a new activity gets created and tweet about it - Strava
description: This n8n workflow uses 2 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems. Streamlines business operations by automating repetitive tasks.

title: Set: Lectura de datos (Workflow avanzado - 7 pasos)
description: Tarea programada que ejecuta lectura de datos periódicamente y integra 5 servicios, realiza 4 tipos de acciones.
